resources.string: Welcome to MDC Location Look Up. This application works with your mobile data capture application. It will look up the name of the area where you are and return the name of that location to the mobile data capture application.
Your location is outside assigned area that you\'ve chosen through the app!
Permission denied! This app needs your location permission to continue.
Your app is not authorized to call this tool!
Gps is needed to get your location
You must select at least one field
Some files are missing! Must contain *.shp, *.shx, and *.dbf
The selected file contains multiple files of the same extension
Error reading files. Please download files from a different source
Your GPS seems to be disabled, do you want to enable it?
